definition.config: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="config_start" deletable="false" x="173" y="121"><next><block type="config_variable"><field name="name">show_tooltips</field><field name="comment">If disabled, extra data from the mod will not show up in item tooltips.</field><value name="value"><block type="config_logic_variable"><field name="name">Show Item Tooltips</field><field name="value">true</field></block></value><next><block type="config_variable"><field name="name">show_scale</field><field name="comment">If disabled, radiation counters will not show the extra overlay in the bottom-left of the screen.</field><value name="value"><block type="config_logic_variable"><field name="name">Show Radiation Scale</field><field name="value">true</field></block></value><next><block type="config_variable"><field name="name">shut_up</field><field name="comment">If enabled, radiation counters/detectors will not click when you're being irradiated.</field><value name="value"><block type="config_logic_variable"><field name="name">Make Counters Shut Up</field><field name="value">false</field></block></value><next><block type="config_variable"><field name="name">click_rate</field><field name="comment">Controls how fast counters click. Higher numbers make more clicks.</field><value name="value"><block type="config_number_variable"><field name="name">Counter Click Rate</field><field name="value">300</field></block></value><next><block type="config_variable"><field name="name">click_pitch</field><field name="comment">Controls the pitch of counter clicks. Higher numbers mean higher pitch.</field><value name="value"><block type="config_number_variable"><field name="name">Counter Click Pitch</field><field name="value">0.8</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block><block type="config_variable" x="176" y="429"><field name="name">shut_up_cures</field><field name="comment">If enabled, curative items won't make zombie cure noises when used.</field><value name="value"><block type="config_logic_variable"><field name="name">Make Cures Shut Up</field><field name="value">false</field></block></value></block></xml>
